short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open the legadilo browser extension to easily subscribe to feeds & save articles in Legadilo

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open the legadilo browser extension to easily subscribe to feeds & save articles in Legadilo directly from the page you are on. Links can be saved in the official legadilo.eu instance or your own personal instance. You only have to configure the extension accordingly.
